name: ts-fonts
description: This example code is bare-bones to show you what this framework can do. If you have the style-dictionary module installed globally, you can `cd` into this directory and run: ```bash style-dictionary build ```

scripts.build: token-transformer tokens.json tokens/output.json global --expandTypography=true --resolveReferences=false | style-dictionary build
scripts.build2: token-transformer tokens.json tokens/output.json global --expandTypography=true --resolveReferences=true | style-dictionary build
